items.name: Garlic Fries
items.desc: House cut, skin on fries tossed in garlic sauce and served with a creamy, spcie red pepper aioli

items.name: Pizza Egg Rolls
items.desc: Mozzarella, pepperoni, and sausage served with a side of our house made pizza sauce

items.name: Bacontaters
items.desc: Brown sugar and cayenne pepper acanided bacon wrapped around classic America Tater Tots.  Served with spicy rasberry BBG sauce

items.name: Crab & Artichoke Dip
items.desc: Artichoke and spinach dip with lump crab served hot with celery, pita toast points, and grilled crostini

items.name: Onion Rings
items.desc: Thick cut, battered sweet onions deep-fried and served with our hickory maple BBG sauce

items.name: Beer & Pretzel Curds
items.desc: From Ellsworth, WI, these curds are battered and deep fried and served with a side of spicy mayo for dipping

items.name: Bacon & Bleu Fries
items.desc: Sweet potato waffle fries tossed inb garlic sauce then topped with bleu cheese, bacon, and scallions.  We serve them with a side of sriracha aioli for dipping

items.name: Quesadilla
items.desc: Marinated grilled chicken, BBQ, bacon, and fresh apple slices with melted cheddar cheese

items.name: Nachos
items.desc: Grilled BBQ chicken and sauteed kale topped with melted cheddar cheese and black bean corn salsa.  Served with salsa and sour cream

name: Burgers
desc: Our gourmet burgers are made with fresh, Certified Angus Beef©rt; and are served on a fresh, grilled brioche bun with fries or tots. Substitute garlic fries, sweet potato fries, onion rings, or Asian slaw for 1.50

items.name: Walk of Shame
items.desc: Jalapeno jelly, peanut butter, bacon, and a fried egg

items.name: Steakhouse
items.desc: Caramelized onions, sauteed mushrooms and brown gravy

items.name: Blackened Bleu
items.desc: Cajun seasoned and topped with bleu cheese, caramelized onions and creole sauce

items.name: Burger Mi
items.desc: topped with seared pork belly, house made kimchi, sriracha aioli, and fresh cilantro

items.name: Sweaty Betty
items.desc: Habenero jack cheese, candied jalapenos, peppered bacon, and sriracha aioli

items.name: Poutine Burger
items.desc: Topped with house cut garlic fries, cheddar cheese, and brown gravy

items.name: Veggie Burger
items.desc: Our quinoa and roasted black bean burger is topped with sundried tomato pesto and shredded kale

items.name: Signature Betty
items.desc: Fresh apple slices, peppered bacon, caramelized onions, and Swiss cheese

items.name: Turkey Caprese
items.desc: Our all natural turkey patty is topped with fresh mozzaraella, tomato, basil, and balsamic glaze

items.name: BYO Burger
items.desc: Sub a veggie patty, turkey patty,or chicken breast for 1.  Lettuce, tomato, and onion free upon request. Add toppings for .75

items.name: Chicken BLT Salad
items.desc: Grilled chicken, bacon, tomato, and red pepper dressing over mixed greens

items.name: Southwest Salad
items.desc: House roasted pork shoulder, black bean corn salsa over mixed greens with cheddar cheese topped with ranch dressing and BBQ

items.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
items.desc: Grilled chicken, croutons, and shredded parmesan in Caesar dressing

items.name: Pork Belly Salad
items.desc: Seared pork belly over mixed greens with pickled vegetables, fried wontons, and sesame soy ginger dressing
